votebox.auditoriumverifierplugins

Class IncrementalAuditoriumLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • votebox.auditoriumverifierplugins.IncrementalAuditoriumLog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IIncrementalPlugin, IVerifierPlugin

    public class IncrementalAuditoriumLog
extends java.lang.Object
implements IIncrementalPlugin
    This verifier plugin maintains all-set and all-dag based on incremental log data given via this API (rather than read from a file). It also registers the signature-verify primitive.

      • closeLog

        public void closeLog()
        Seal the logs -- the verifier will no longer return a reduction now. If something isn't in the log the verifier will expect that it never will be.
        Specified by:
        closeLog in interface IIncrementalPlugin
